text: @realDonaldTrump God is so merciful, He will forgive Americans their wicked sins of same sex practices which is abomination before God. Rev. 21v8. It's because of this wickedly sin against God that God destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah. This COVID-19 is a warning to the world...

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
